listing_company_name: Ray White - Lower North Shore Group
description:
Construction Commenced - Forecast Completion May 2023

Sure to leave a lasting impression, these two brand new tri-level duplexes showcase the best of contemporary design upon a superbly convenient treelined streetscape, with filtered views towards Middle Harbour.

Balancing curved lines with vertical timber cladding, the elegant frontage hints at the architectural ingenuity inside. Serviced by an internal lift, there is fabulous separation between the primary bedrooms, everyday living and lower-level entertainment quarters. Opening out to a protected patio and level lawn, the rumpus room layout boasts a wet bar and has easy access to the gymnasium and fourth bathroom.

Built to a high specification, concrete slabs ground each floor. United by engineered oak flooring, commercial quality black framed aluminium windows ensure natural light is maximised throughout. Windows are dressed in floor-to-ceiling electric blinds and a Samsung door lock with fingerprint entry ensures security is of paramount importance.

Surrounded by green space, discover the endless appeal of this popular lifestyle pocket close to tennis courts, golf courses, celebrated eateries, shops and city transport links. Travel into the city centre in less than 10 minutes by car passing through just a single set of traffic lights.

• Two living areas, one of which flows to outdoor entertaining
• Interconnecting living, dining and state of the art chef's kitchen
• Natural stone benchtops in the kitchen, butlers' pantry and wet bar
• Franke tapware, integrated fridge/freezer and Vintec wine cooler
• Double Miele ovens, induction cooktop with downdraft extractor
• Miele fully integrated dishwasher, microwave and steam oven
• Built-ins or WIRs in all bedrooms, master and bed 4 with ensuites
• Stone floor and wall tiles in each bathroom, custom wall hung vanities
• Single panel frameless glass shower screens, master ensuite with bath
• Solar panel system with battery and electric car charger
• Underfloor heating to all bathrooms with zoned control panels
• Guest powder room servicing the living areas, lower level laundry
• Domus internal lift encased in frosted glass, ducted air-conditioning
• Handy internal access from the lock-up garage with remote entry
• Dedicated Cellar room with glass door
• Optional upgrades include an outdoor kitchen
• Less than 50m to Cammeray Golf and Tennis Clubs and Cammeray Oval
• Around 500m to The Oaks Hotel, local cafes and city bus stops

For more information or to arrange a site inspection, please contact Alex Hillston on 0451 033 396 or James Downing 0405 716 464.


* All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable, however we cannot guarantee or give any warranty to the information provided.

Looking for a home loan? Contact Loan Market's Matt Clayton, our preferred broker. He doesn't work for the banks, he works for you. Call him on 0414 877 333 or visit loanmarket.com.au/lower-north-shore
